sub_title: Senior Contamination Control Engineer / Defectivity Architect /Cleanroom Specialist
summary:
• Result-oriented Contamination Control professional with over 8 years of experience in particle contamination control procedures, Tribology, and Mechanical behavior of particles and materials working in the R&D Semiconductor field.
• Fluent in surface characterization methods like Microscopy, SEM/EDX, FTIR, Raman, AFM, TOC analysis, SP2 analysis, Boombox, PMC, Particle Counting, and Wafer analysis.
• Fluent in macro - micro -nano particle characterization.
• Highly motivated worker with a continuous 8+ years learning curve on cleanroom cleanliness technologies, including control methods, working methods, standardization of cleaning methodologies, inspection and cleaning processes, outgassing and RGA measurements.
• 7+ years experience in developing new test and setting up test plans including execution and data analysis.
• 7+ years experience in supporting the factory, customers and suppliers with solving issues, escalations and improving their products.
• 5+ years architecting and conceptualizing pollution models for Contamination and Tribology budgets.
• 3+ years of leading improvement programs related to machine submodules.
• 2+ years experience in elastomers analysis, guidelines preparation to support field supplies to improve and satisfy current defectivity, mechanical, tribological, electrical customer requirements.
• 2+ years experience in new product quality improvement, Rootcase analysis, FMEA analysis, SixSigma analysis.
• Stakeholder Relationships and KPI dashboards / Functions Scorecards presentation skills.
• Interface with all relevant sectors including Factory (System integration, NPI, Quality), R&D, suppliers and customers.
• Daily experience in taking ownership to develop, improve, maintain, solve and/or prevent complex customer requests.

authors.headline: Senior Contamination Control Engineer / Defectivity Architect /Cleanroom Specialist

authors.name: D.G. Constantin, D. Munteanu, C. Moura

courses.name: Design for Six Sigma Green Belt training

profile_positions.description:
•	Translate Defectivity Requirements into Functional Requirements for the Wafer Handler for NXE 3600/3800 and EXE.
•	Update weekly to the counterpart stakeholders including ASML and suppliers, but not limited to, Defectivity, Thermal and Mechanical Architects, as well as System Engineers.
•	Create and contribute to the improvement agenda and communicate to suppliers on a regular basis.
•	Lead decision key person contributing on improvement of Cleanrooms and diverse system level components.
•	Contribute or directly decide on test setups that satisfy the requirements for particle control and tribology constraints.
•	Data Treatment and Analysis and KPI dashboard management for Defectivity-on-Wafer milestones.
•	Define new cleaning procedures, ways of working, standardization of cleaning methodologies and inspection for cleanroom.
•	Introduce in cleanroom new measurement methods and tools to ensure and monitor the cleanroom surface particle cleanliness according ISO Class 14644 – 12.
profile_positions.title: Senior Architect Defectivity Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Validated models which gives the relation between wafer take-over and particle generation (WBPC, WBD):
•	Material selection in function of the system parameters needs defined by requirements.
•	Created KPI Dashboard that updates itself as the (very long) tests finish and data is retrieved
•	Cleanroom tests setup and implementation, PIR / TPS / TAR documentation
•	Particle and material characterization using SEM/EDX , FTIR, 
•	Statistical Analysis on data and implementation on EXE:5000 for the DLC-H Pins

Load Locks gate-valves improvements towards new NXE:3600 defectivty specs 
•	Leading improvement program of different Load Lock gate valves designs
•	Interface between multiple business units 
•	Support and consultancy on defectivity improvements of different Load Lock gate valves designs
•	System level test proposal (EP’s planning, UID creations, Integration, alignment)
•	Statistical data analysis and implementation, PIR / TPS / TAR documentation
•	Gate valves implementation on NXE 3600 D
profile_positions.title: Contamination Control Expert

profile_positions.description:
Defectivity issues solver at system level NXE platforms
•	Plan and test set up plan implementation for different submodules
•	Defect and particle surface analysis of parts by means of using optical and visual inspection. 
•	Root cause analysis, FMEA analysis
•	Wafer data analysis and statistical approach
•	Results implementation and guidelines improvements towards suppliers and customers.

Improve and minimize contamination in Cleanrooms ISO 6 and ISO 7
•	Matrix plan development reduce particle cross-contamination risks from people to assembled parts.
•	Test set-up and experiment activities in order to control and improve the people way of working in the clean rooms.
•	Setting up new cleanroom procedures and specifications.
profile_positions.title: Junior Contamination Control Engineer

profile_positions.description:
R&D activities including new projects/applications for smart mobile phones such:
• Development of new applications for Samsung. 
• Creation and implementation of new mathematical methods.
• Guidelines to improve the current smart mobile phones applications.
profile_positions.title: Technological Researcher in Physics

profile_positions.description:
R&D activities in Surface Engineering field as following:
• Obtaining and optimizing MeNx and MeOy (Me = Ti, Zr, Ta) thin films using reactive magnetron sputtering technique.
• Hands on in sample preparation and deposition using PVD/CVD techniques.
• Hands on in samples surface characterization using methods such: XRD analysis, SEM-EDX analysis, Raman analysis, AFM analysis, microscopic analysis, friction coefficient analysis by Pin on Disk method, roughness analyisis, coating thickness analysis. 
• Structural, optical, mechanical and tribological characterization of thin films. Test proposal, data analysis and interpretation.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Basic activities performed in the company:
• Supervision and correction psychological tests, registration of the results in the database of the company, interviews, staff evidence - SAP Software.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Assistant
